Package gov.tak.platform.client.dted

Class ElevationDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.tak.platform.client.dted.ElevationDownloader
  • public class ElevationDownloader
extends java.lang.Object
    Downloads DTED elevation data in the background for areas of interest. Downloads are triggered by calling scanCurrentAreas() and happen in a background thread.

    • Nested Class Summary
